column6: THE KUNG FU SAGA CONCLUDES! Shang-Chi continues battling through the Thirteen Chambers to face his father, the immortal Emperor Zu! But first, he must defeat his rivals, Rand-K'ai, Great Master of the Iron Fist, and Red Sai, deadly leader of the Red Hand!
column8: | writer:William Haden Blackman | penciller (cover):Francesco Francavilla | penciller:Dalibor Talajic | editor:Jacob Thomas
